name: Forest in the Trees
short_description:
There a saying in English "Can't see the forest through the trees." Its implying that the person is so dumb they think the grove of tress are blocking their view of the forest.

This utility is a play on the inverse of that concept were-if you could see a forest through the trees.

It has two primary functions:
1 is to Plant a grove of Trees, where a tree is a file of randomness.

2 is to View a Forest, by aligning the trees in the grove so that they appear to make out shape down the line of sight (your view), and saving that view as a file(Forest).
summary: A file utillity based off seeing a forest through the trees
